solution_line_template: The pen is shorter than the pencil by {pen_shorter_than_pencil} centimeters, so it's {pencil_length} - {pen_shorter_than_pencil} = <<{pencil_length}-{pen_shorter_than_pencil}={pen_length}>>{pen_length} centimeters long.
That means the rubber is {pen_length} - {pen_longer_than_rubber} = <<{pen_length}-{pen_longer_than_rubber}={rubber_length}>>{rubber_length} centimeters long
So all accessories are {rubber_length} + {pen_length} + {pencil_length} = <<{rubber_length}+{pen_length}+{pencil_length}={total_length}>>{total_length} centimeters long altogether.
